title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
Hello 
i have a macbook a2159.  the display has not worked for 2 days.  I tested the display and that's still okay.  I have also completed a usb c tester and everything seems to be ok there too.  could someone help me a little to find the error?  I'm unfortunately not a professional ? thank you to everyone.  and please excuse my english ?

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Do you mean the LCD assembly has been tested and fully works in similar machine?
You will need to measure some voltages and signals on the MLB.
Start posting the 820-xxxxx code of your board.

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 78720, member: 682"]
First of all, welcome to the forum!

You will need to measure some voltages and signals on the MLB.

have already read many comments from you.  Thank you for taking the time for me.  exactly, I tested the display in a working mbp.  the number is: 820-01598-A

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
Did you confirm USB activity, or just power?
Caps Lock light reacts?
Do you get external video?

BTW, do not quote an entire post, visible few centimeters above.
Write directly into bottom Reply box, intsead of clicking Reply button.

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
USB 20V and regularly drops to 5V
0.1 to 0.4a
2w

"testet"
No light on Caps Lock
No external video

PPBUS_G3H        12,6V
PP3v3_G3H        3,3V
PP1V8_SLPS2R        1,8V
PP1V8_AWAKE        1,8V
PP1V1_SLPS2R        1,1V
PP0V8_SLPS2R        0,8V
PP3V3_AWAKE        3,3V
PP1V2_AWAKE        1,19V
PMU_PVDDMAIN_EN        3,3V
P3V3MAIN_PGOOD        3,27V
PP3V_G3H_RTC        3,0V
PCH_RTC_RESET_L        3,0V
P5VG3S_EN        3,3V
PP5V_G3S        5.1V

and the fan turns sometimes

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
So there is no USB activity, despite of your first mention.
"I have also completed a usb c tester and everything seems to be ok there too"
Read how to properly check that:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/how-to-collection.60974/[/URL]

In this case, there is no reason to check for image, or backlight.

Try revive option in DFU mode.
If no important data into internal SSD, can try restore too.

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message: DFU mode does not work unfortunately.

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
Did you exactly follow all the steps from the above link?

Try to start in SMC bypass mode.
Check if you get voltage on big coils (secondary power supplies).
There should be some voltages present, when fan spins at least.

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
I think SMC bypass mode worked.
now I have
20V
0.03a up to 1.1a
1w up to 22w

made a few more measurements on the coils. I have at PP1v2, 0V and a pulsation of up to 1.2V

title: A2159 display dont Turn on
message:
"I think SMC bypass mode worked."
Do you mean the board stays on now?
Get steady voltages, no pulsing?
